title: Wheel of Fortune Bonus Puzzle Answer Today for March 17-21, 2025
description: The WoF answers from March 17 to 21. The post Wheel of Fortune Bonus Puzzle Answer Today for March 17-21, 2025 appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Nicholas Tan
excerpt: Here is the answer to the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle today during the third week of March 2025. We'll have the Fan Friday word as well.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Below you’ll find the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle answer today from March 17 to March 21, 2025. We’ll update this guide every day with the latest answers on a daily basis. For each day in the week, we’ll post the solution for the bonus round first and then provide the answer for the other toss-ups and regular puzzles after that. Festivals and celebrations are the general theme for this week’s Wheel of Fortune games, so they’ll be some answers related to vacations and parties. The solutions here are for the regular version of the show hosted by Ryan Seacrest and Vanna White (we’ll have the solutions to Celebrity Wheel of Fortune in a separate post). Tonight’s game will feature three new contestants: Russ Paoletti, Eleni Kapetanakis, and Nikki Ashley. Here are all the solutions to the Wheel of Fortune puzzles for March 19. What are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers tonight? The following are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers for Wednesday, March 19, 2025 and the categories (in brackets) for each puzzle shown in tonight’s episode. Bonus Round Puzzle – ORANGE GROVE [Place] Tossup #1 – CHOOSE YOUR OWN ADVENTURE [Title] Tossup #2 – FASHION PHOTOGRAPHER [Occupation] Regular Puzzle #1 – CRAZIER THINGS HAVE HAPPENED [Phrase] Regular Puzzle #2 – PROTEIN & POOL [Crossword] Regular Puzzle #3 – SHAMROCKS AND CLOVERS [Living Things] Tossup #3 – BREAD IN THE BREADBASKET [Food & Drink] Tossup #4 – A BAGEL IN THE TOASTER [Food & Drink] Tossup #5 – A BUN IN THE OVEN [Food & Drink] Regular Puzzle #4 – SHOWCASING MY SKILLS [What Are You Doing?] Here are the puzzle answers for Tuesday, March 18: Bonus Round Puzzle – GAZEBO [Place] Tossup #1 – CRACKING OPEN A COCONUT [What Are You Doing?] Tossup #2 – PUT DOWN THE PHONE [Travel Tip] Regular Puzzle #1 – WORKING VACATION [Opposites Attract] Regular Puzzle #2 – ORANGE CHICKEN LITTLE [Before & After] Regular Puzzle #3 – GAZING UP AT THE CLOUDS [Life’s A Beach] Tossup #3 – FAMILY PORTRAIT [Say Cheese!] Tossup #4 – PROFILE PICTURE [Say Cheese!] Tossup #5 – MUG SHOT [Say Cheese!] Regular Puzzle #4 – COOKING WITH GAS [Phrase] Here are the puzzle answers for Monday, March 17: Bonus Round Puzzle – I WOULD BE DELIGHTED [Phrase] Tossup #1 – HULA DANCE INSTRUCTOR [Occupation] Tossup #2 – GREEN SEA TURTLES [Living Things] Regular Puzzle #1 – MARGARITA, MOJITO, MIMOSA, MUDSLIDE [Same Letter] Regular Puzzle #2 – TAKING A BREAK FROM SOCIAL MEDIA [What Are You Doing?] Regular Puzzle #3 – JUST ANOTHER PERFECT DAY [Phrase] Tossup #3 – BILLBOARD [Thing] Tossup #4 – CORKBOARD [Thing] Tossup #5 – GOURMET CHEESE BOARD [Thing] Regular Puzzle #4 – DREAMS REALLY DO COME TRUE [Song Lyrics] As usual for this season, the Fan Friday contest by Collette is still live. The Fan Friday word for the sweepstakes will be posted at some point during the March 21 episode. Wheel Watchers watching in Los Angeles have access to the Wheel Wednesdays Giveaway where they can win $1,000 every Wednesday through April 2.
html:
Below you’ll find the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle answer today from March 17 to March 21, 2025. We’ll update this guide every day with the latest answers on a daily basis. For each day in the week, we’ll post the solution for the bonus round first and then provide the answer for the other toss-ups and regular puzzles after that.

Festivals and celebrations are the general theme for this week’s Wheel of Fortune games, so they’ll be some answers related to vacations and parties. The solutions here are for the regular version of the show hosted by Ryan Seacrest and Vanna White (we’ll have the solutions to Celebrity Wheel of Fortune in a separate post). Tonight’s game will feature three new contestants: Russ Paoletti, Eleni Kapetanakis, and Nikki Ashley. Here are all the solutions to the Wheel of Fortune puzzles for March 19.

What are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers tonight?

The following are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers for Wednesday, March 19, 2025 and the categories (in brackets) for each puzzle shown in tonight’s episode.

  • Bonus Round Puzzle – ORANGE GROVE [Place]
  • Tossup #1 – CHOOSE YOUR OWN ADVENTURE [Title]
  • Tossup #2 – FASHION PHOTOGRAPHER [Occupation]
  • Regular Puzzle #1 – CRAZIER THINGS HAVE HAPPENED [Phrase]
  • Regular Puzzle #2 – PROTEIN & POOL [Crossword]
  • Regular Puzzle #3 – SHAMROCKS AND CLOVERS [Living Things]
  • Tossup #3 – BREAD IN THE BREADBASKET [Food & Drink]
  • Tossup #4 – A BAGEL IN THE TOASTER [Food & Drink]
  • Tossup #5 – A BUN IN THE OVEN [Food & Drink]
  • Regular Puzzle #4 – SHOWCASING MY SKILLS [What Are You Doing?]

Here are the puzzle answers for Tuesday, March 18:

  • Bonus Round Puzzle – GAZEBO [Place]
  • Tossup #1 – CRACKING OPEN A COCONUT [What Are You Doing?]
  • Tossup #2 – PUT DOWN THE PHONE [Travel Tip]
  • Regular Puzzle #1 – WORKING VACATION [Opposites Attract]
  • Regular Puzzle #2 – ORANGE CHICKEN LITTLE [Before & After]
  • Regular Puzzle #3 – GAZING UP AT THE CLOUDS [Life’s A Beach]
  • Tossup #3 – FAMILY PORTRAIT [Say Cheese!]
  • Tossup #4 – PROFILE PICTURE [Say Cheese!]
  • Tossup #5 – MUG SHOT [Say Cheese!]
  • Regular Puzzle #4 – COOKING WITH GAS [Phrase]

Here are the puzzle answers for Monday, March 17:

  • Bonus Round Puzzle – I WOULD BE DELIGHTED [Phrase]
  • Tossup #1 – HULA DANCE INSTRUCTOR [Occupation]
  • Tossup #2 – GREEN SEA TURTLES [Living Things]
  • Regular Puzzle #1 – MARGARITA, MOJITO, MIMOSA, MUDSLIDE [Same Letter]
  • Regular Puzzle #2 – TAKING A BREAK FROM SOCIAL MEDIA [What Are You Doing?]
  • Regular Puzzle #3 – JUST ANOTHER PERFECT DAY [Phrase]
  • Tossup #3 – BILLBOARD [Thing]
  • Tossup #4 – CORKBOARD [Thing]
  • Tossup #5 – GOURMET CHEESE BOARD [Thing]
  • Regular Puzzle #4 – DREAMS REALLY DO COME TRUE [Song Lyrics]

As usual for this season, the Fan Friday contest by Collette is still live. The Fan Friday word for the sweepstakes will be posted at some point during the March 21 episode.

Wheel Watchers watching in Los Angeles have access to the Wheel Wednesdays Giveaway where they can win $1,000 every Wednesday through April 2.
